system.requirements:
.Servitor Comrade: Incendio-Class Gun Servitor
Apt: None
system.descriptionText:
Incendio-Class Gun Servitor Primary Function. Servitor Comrade makes Standard Ranged Attack with its Integrated Flamer, enemies in the area of effect can avoid the attack with +0 Agility Test as normal.
Attack Orders have Attack Action Subtype, counts as Player's Attack for the turn.
